brief_title: Impact of Obesity on the Efficacy of Endocrine Therapy With Aromatase Inhibitors
inclusion_criteria:
inclusion criteria: 

 postmenopausal patients with breast cancer who have hormones receptor positive tumour as defined by the expression of oestrogen receptor (ER) and/or progesterone receptor (PR). 

 patients with a tumour stage IB, IC, or II irrespective of nodal stage (< 10 positive nodes)
brief_summary: To see the impact of obesity on the efficacy of adjuvant endocrine therapy with aromatase inhibitors in postmenopausal patients with early breast cancer in terms of:~i) Locoregional recurrence ii) Distant metastases iii) Disease-free survival iv) Overall survival
